original_text: I have filled him with my Spirit so that he has special skills. He knows how to make many kinds of things.
korean_text: 하나님의 영을 그에게 충만하게 하여 지혜와 총명과 지식과 여러 가지 재주로

sentences.original_text: I have filled him with my Spirit
so that he has special skills
He knows how to make many kinds of things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여러 종류의 것들을 만드는 방법을 안다
